mapper.select: SELECT rm.RESERVE_TIME as reserveTime ,cm.CLIENT_NM as clientNm ,cm.CLIENT_TEL as clientTel ,wm.WORK_NM as workNm ,rm.OTHER_INFO as otherInfo ,rm.PAY_STATE as payState ,wrm.WORKER_NM as workerNm ,cm.COUPON as coupon ,DATE_FORMAT(rm.RESERVE_DATE,'%Y%m%d') as reserveDate FROM naildb.reserve_master rm INNER JOIN naildb.client_master cm ON rm.CLIENT_NO = cm.CLIENT_NO LEFT JOIN naildb.work_master wm ON rm.WORK_STATE = wm.WORK_STATE LEFT JOIN naildb.pay_master pm ON rm.PAY_STATE = pm.PAY_STATE LEFT JOIN naildb.worker_master wrm ON rm.WORKER_CODE = wrm.WORKER_CODE
